Articles.Content:
It seems no matter if I build my own or load a premade assembled rocket, when I attempt to go to the Launchpad I get the message "The Launchpad is out of service".

Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks

Keith

Edited November 1, 2014 by Foristall

Did you destroy the launchpad by any chance?

Check the space center screen. If it's a pile of rubble you'll need to rebuild it.
Also if you destroy all the buildings around the launch site it will make it out of service.
You could try going to the difficulty settings, click on indestructibly facilities. I'm not sure if that will bring the launch pad back. But maybe.
From KSC view, right click on the pad, and it will tell you much it will cost to repair it and put it back in service.

Thanks very much Vanamonde, That got us going again. I'm launching again. Now I'm getting through the backlog of assembled vehicles ready for testing.

Keith
Thankyou!! I had a major crash shortly after take off and destroyed my launchpad.
